Packages that use SecureMessage

Uses of SecureMessage in org.cougaar.core.mts
 

Methods in org.cougaar.core.mts with parameters of type SecureMessage
 Message MessageSecurityManager.unsecureMessage(SecureMessage m)
          Reverse the transform that secureMessage does, using whatever techniques are needed to verify the integrity and source of the message.
